sentences.en: Companionship can include a spouse, member, hired caregiver, hospice volunteer, Good Samaritan, or pet.
sentences.cn: 陪伴你的可能是你的伴侣 、 家人 、 保姆 、 义工 、 热心帮助你的人(撒玛利亚人), 甚至宠物.

sentences.en: Do you think your English is good enough to work as a live - in caregiver?
sentences.cn: 你认为做居家保姆工作,你的英语水平足够 吗 ?

sentences.en: From caregiver to cared for, from cared for to caregiver, our relationship had come full circle.
sentences.cn: 她已从关爱者变为受照顾者, 我则从受照顾者变为关爱者, 我们的关系倒了个个儿.

sentences.en: In addition to fulfilling the traditional roles of caregiver and homemaker, many Orthodox women also assume the role of primary breadwinner so their husbands can pursue religious studies full time.
sentences.cn: 除了要践行传统的照料者和主妇角色，许多东正教女性也要承担起养家的责任以便她们的丈夫可以全身心进行宗教研究。

sentences.en: That brings caregiver burden, which a higher risk for depression and other stress - related illnesses.
sentences.cn: 这会加重看护负担, 并且加重患抑郁以及压力相关疾病的风险.

sentences.en: The major health problem of the caregiver was caregiver role strain.
sentences.cn: 另案妻主要的健康问题为照顾者角色紧张.

sentences.en: They should tell their medical caregiver that they have recently been to Mexico.
sentences.cn: 这些员工应将他们近期去过墨西哥的情况告诉他们的医疗关心人员.

trans.tran_en: someone who takes care of a child or sick person
